posts.post_title: FS/T T206 Nap Lajoie BVG 2 (Throwing) SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nap Lajoie Sweet Caporal 150 649 overprint.  There is a heavy crease on upper left corner and also someone wrote "350" on back upper half.  Case is in great shape with no cracks or nasty scratches.  SOLD
Price is dlvd...paypal gift/owed or check
